text:
Is there a way to access video properties from hubDB like we access image properties?
For example, the `video` column type, whenever I loop through a row, it only outputâ€™s the file ID. If I try to output the video url, `row.video_column.url` nothing happens. I know the video_player tag is ideal for this, but in my situation I need to have some custom markup.
I am working on a way to get the video metadata from the video id
